Review Text: I use the polygel nails, and from time to time, I need to clip it on to hold it on until it gets completely dry. I got these clips to help aid in holding my nails in place. But for some reason, these clips leave dents in my nails. I  had to redo them totally. 1 star is the lowest  I can go.
Review Title: Dents in nails
Rating: 1.0

reference_summary:
Natural Solution Himalayan Pink Salt Body Scrub with Organic Marula Essential Oil, Moisturizes and Nourishes Face & Skin - 12.3 Oz
Natural Solution
['Natural Solution Organic Marula Oil Body Scrub Exfoliate and nourish your skin with this luxurious Natural Solution body scrub made with organic marula oil. Marula oil is a natural oil & is known for its ability to moisturize and protect the skin, as well as to reduce the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines. This body scrub is also made with Himalayan pink salt, which is a natural exfoliator that helps to remove dead skin cells and leave your skin feeling smooth and soft. The scrub is gentle enough for daily use, and it is perfect for all skin types. Usage: Apply a generous amount of scrub to wet skin. Massage in circular motions for 2-3 minutes. Rinse with water. Use 2 times per week for best results. Caution: Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse immediately with water. Keep out of reach of children. Store in a cool, dry place. Benefits: 1- Exfoliates and removes dead skin cells 2- Moisturizes and nourishes the skin 3- Protects the skin from free radicals 4- Leaves skin feeling smooth and soft 5-Suitable for all skin types']
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.75 x 3.75 x 3.6 inches; 12.35 Ounces', 'Item model number': '8246E', 'UPC': '818581019775', 'Manufacturer': 'Natural Solution'}
Unfortunately, when I first used this, it caused a rash. I passed it on to a friend of mine, who seems to like it. Saying, "her skin feels so soft and smooth."
Sharing with friends

profile:
The user maintains a strong preference for natural and organic skincare products focused on moisturizing and nourishing properties. They appreciate body scrubs featuring natural exfoliators, highlighting their interest in achieving smooth and soft skin. However, a recent interaction indicates a cautious approach to product selection due to a previously experienced adverse reaction (rash) that suggests sensitivity to certain formulations. This concern is further emphasized by a low rating reflecting dissatisfaction with a product’s performance.

In a broader context, the user values sharing experiences with friends, as evidenced by their willingness to pass on unsuitable products to others who benefited from them. This shows a communal aspect to their preferences, likely favoring effective and recommendable items.

The latest interaction reveals the user’s engagement in nail care, where they purchased clips intended to assist with polygel nails. Despite their purpose, the user experienced an issue with these clips leaving dents in their nails, resulting in a very low rating. This addition to their profile underscores a broader interest in beauty products while still reflecting the user’s overall cautious approach, seeking both effectiveness and gentleness. Their experiences highlight a continued emphasis on product performance and suitability, consistent with their skincare preferences.
